TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TriggerAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The enumeration is used by the class to indicate what action fired the trigger.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.TriggerAction> enumeration is used by the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext> class to indicate what action fired the trigger.
For more information, see the [Transact-SQL Reference](/sql/t-sql/language-reference).
